Subsection.Text: “Account” means the Florida Export Finance Corporation account in the Florida Intergovernmental Relations Foundation, Inc.
“Board” means the board of directors of the Florida Export Finance Corporation.
“Corporation” means the Florida Export Finance Corporation.
“Domiciled in this state” means registered to do business in this state.
“Financial institution” shall have the same meaning as that term is defined in s. 655.005.
“President” means the chief executive officer of the Florida Export Finance Corporation.
“Small and medium-sized businesses” or “businesses” means businesses domiciled in this state which employ less than 250 people and have a net worth of less than $6 million.
